description: This trap indicates when an interworking
PVC has experienced an alarmed condition,
either on the ATM network side or Frame Relay side.
Also it is generated when the PVC alarmed
condition is cleared. It carries the opera
tional status of the PVC by the frf8ConnOperStatus
as well as the reason why exiting,entering or
changing the alarmed state frf8ConnPVCAlarmReason.
If the interworking PVC changes its status by a
AdminStatus command (active/inactive/testing),
causing the frf8ConnOperStatus to change (up/down)
this trap will be generated with frf8ConnPVCAlarmReason
set to 'nodefect'. This TRAP will give the support
to manage defects that might occur in either Frame
Relay network or ATM network, even if the PVC Operational
Status is already down.

Summary.eval: ($v4 == 1) ? 'PVC admin status changed to $v3' : (($v4 == 2) ? 'Frame Relay alarm occurred' : (($v4 == 3) ? 'Frame Relay alarm cleared' : (($v4 == 4 || $v4 == 6) ? 'ATM network alarm occurred' : 'ATM network alarm cleared')))

tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8PVCStatus Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnFrServiceIfIndex i 9999 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnDlci i 9999 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnOperStatus i 1 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnPVCAlarmReason i 1

$SNMPTRAPCMD Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8PVCStatus Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnFrServiceIfIndex i 9998 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnDlci i 9998 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnOperStatus i 2 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnPVCAlarmReason i 2

$SNMPTRAPCMD Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8PVCStatus Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnFrServiceIfIndex i 9998 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnDlci i 9998 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnOperStatus i 1 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnPVCAlarmReason i 3

$SNMPTRAPCMD Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8PVCStatus Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnFrServiceIfIndex i 9997 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnDlci i 9997 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnOperStatus i 2 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnPVCAlarmReason i 4

$SNMPTRAPCMD Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8PVCStatus Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnFrServiceIfIndex i 9997 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnDlci i 9997 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnOperStatus i 1 Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnPVCAlarmReason i 5

description: Interface index of the Frame Relay service this
connection exists on
variables.name: Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnFrServiceIfIndex

description: DLCI of this connection on the frame relay service
variables.name: Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnDlci

description: The current operational status of the interworking
connection
variables.name: Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnOperStatus

description: Defines the reason why the PVC entered/exited the alarmed
condition.Defines if the SAC (service affect Condition) is
caused/cleared by the Frame Relay network(frAlarmed/frClear)
or by the ATM network (aisAlarmed/aisClear,rdiAlarmed/aisClear).
The nodefect means no current SAC in either network. This
object will be part of the frf8PVCAlarmTRAP.
variables.name: Fore-frf8-MIB::frf8ConnPVCAlarmReason
